title: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott are reportedly living together again
text:
From Cosmopolitan

If you thought Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth’s split was complicated, it turns out they’ve got nothing on Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott.

Stormi Webster’s parents left fans devo'd when they broke things off at the beginning of the month following two years of dating.

Since then, there’s been all sorts of speculative stories circulating about what was behind their split, like he didn’t want marriage and a more settled family routine.

However, less than three weeks after the split became public knowledge, it’s already being reported that Kylie and Travis are pretty much back living together.



Photo credit: Getty Images More

According to TMZ, Travis injured himself during a fall on stage and he’s been getting some TLC from Kylie while he recovers. He’s either been staying at her house in Calabasas or at the house they shared together in Beverly Hills.

The website reports they’re largely maintaining a friendship for 20-month-old Stormi, but say friends of the pair reckon they could be back together by the end of the year.

They’ve certainly been spending a lot of time together, with Travis popping up in Kylie’s Instagram Stories on a number of occasions over the last week.

Together, they took Stormi along to a pumpkin patch with her cousins True and Dream, and just days before that fans spotted his hand in one of Kylie's Instagram Stories filmed at her mansion.





{% verbatim %}

{% endverbatim %}







Kim, Kris, Kourtney, Khloe and co. will no doubt be pleased to hear there could be a romantic reunion on the cards because they’ve reportedly been rooting for them ever since the split.

“Her family wants them to be together. Travis might not be perfect, but he’s a great partner and dad,” a source told People last week.

“Everyone would be upset if Kylie can’t figure things out with Travis.”

Whether they officially rekindle their romance or not, it’s great to see the pair still on such great terms!
